de.mrapp.android.dialog.model

Interface DialogDecorator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dialog
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDialogDecorator, AbstractDialogFragmentDecorator, ButtonBarDialogDecorator, HeaderDialogDecorator, ListDialogDecorator, MaterialDialogDecorator, ProgressDialogDecorator, ScrollableDialogDecorator, ValidateableDialogDecorator, WizardDialogDecorator

    public interface DialogDecorator
extends Dialog
    Defines the interface, all decorators, which allow to modify the view hierarchy of a dialog, must implement.
    Since:
    3.6.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onRestoreInstanceState(Bundle savedInstanceState)
      The method, which is invoked in order to restore the state, which has previously stored within a bundle.
      void onSaveInstanceState(Bundle outState)
      The method, which is invoked in order to stores the decorator's state.

      • Methods inherited from interface de.mrapp.android.dialog.model.Dialog

        getContext

    • Method Detail

      • onSaveInstanceState

        void onSaveInstanceState(@NonNull
                         Bundle outState)
        The method, which is invoked in order to stores the decorator's state.
        Parameters:
        outState - The bundle, the decorator's state should be stored within, as an instance of the class Bundle. The bundle may not be null

      • onRestoreInstanceState

        void onRestoreInstanceState(@NonNull
                            Bundle savedInstanceState)
        The method, which is invoked in order to restore the state, which has previously stored within a bundle.
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - The bundle, which has been used to store the state, as an instance of the class Bundle. The bundle may not be null
